item.title: Features
item.description: Choose a feature to learn more or run Quick Install to download and install After Dark and try any of these yourself.
item.content:encoded: Choose a feature to learn more or run Quick Install to download and install After Dark and try any of these yourself.

item.title: Modules
item.description: After Dark includes a Module System and several optional modules designed to compliment your site. A list of available modules can be found below.
item.content:encoded: After Dark includes a Module System and several optional modules designed to compliment your site. A list of available modules can be found below.

item.title: Validate Release
item.description: SHA-512 Digest: Submit with 10.3.2 Release Hash to validate. JavaScript required for proper validation. Valid installations use the Quick Install or Upgrade Script and may be checked offline. See Release Hashes for a more thorough approach to validation.
item.content:encoded: SHA-512 Digest: Submit with 10.3.2 Release Hash to validate. JavaScript required for proper validation. Valid installations use the Quick Install or Upgrade Script and may be checked offline. See Release Hashes for a more thorough approach to validation.
